Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the frog skin active peptide family (Brevinin subfamily)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Swiss_Prot Entry P0C5W7]Gram-positive bacterium:Staphylococcus aureus (low activity);Gram-negative bacterium:Escherichia coli (MIC<15 µM).
Sequence Information.Function: Has low activity against the Gram-positive bacteria

Literature.Title: Characterization of antimicrobial peptides isolated from the skin of the Chinese frog, Rana dybowskii.
Literature.Reference: Comp Biochem Physiol B Biochem Mol Biol. 2009 Oct;154(2)174-178.
Literature.Author: Jin LL, Li Q, Song SS, Feng K, Zhang DB, Wang QY, Chen YH.

Literature.Title: Cytolytic peptides belonging to the brevinin-1 and brevinin-2 families isolated from the skin of the Japanese brown frog, Rana dybowskii.
Literature.Author: Conlon JM, Kolodziejek J, Nowotny N, Leprince J, Vaudry H, Coquet L, Jouenne T, Iwamuro S.
